title: Multidisciplinary Project-Based Microlearning for Energy Sustainability and Technology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic energy management knowledge and project collaboration experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing problem-solving competencies for sustainability issues linked to workplace tasks, targeting office/administrative professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with multidisciplinary team members to draft an energy efficiency improvement project
Learners can analyze sustainable technology trends using microlearning content in mobile environments
Learners can improve their project approach by over 80% based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
